TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WmiWebEventProvider extends System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider

summary.span: 实现将 ASP.NET 运行状况监视事件映射到 Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) 事件的事件提供程序。

span.span: Implements an event provider that maps ASP.NET health-monitoring events to Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET health monitoring 允许生产和运营人员管理已部署的 Web 应用程序。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含的运行状况事件类型负责打包应用程序运行状况数据, 以及负责处理此数据的提供程序类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在运行状况事件的管理过程中可帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. ASP.NET 使用此类将运行状况监视事件映射到 WMI 事件。ASP.NET uses this class to map health-monitoring events to WMI events. 若要启用 ASP.NET 运行状况监视事件到 WMI 子系统的传递, 必须通过在配置文件的``节中添加适当的设置来配置类。To enable the delivery of ASP.NET health-monitoring events to the WMI subsystem, you must configure the class by adding the appropriate settings in the `` section of the configuration file. Aspnet mof 文件中包含的信息描述了在将 ASP.NET 运行状况监视事件路由到类并将其映射到 WMI 事件时引发的 WMI 事件的参数。The information contained in the Aspnet.mof file describes the parameters of the WMI events raised when ASP.NET health-monitoring events are routed to the class and mapped into WMI events. Aspnet 文件存储在 .NET Framework 生成目录中, 例如%windir%\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\*BuildNumber*。The Aspnet.mof file is stored in the .NET Framework build directory, for example %windir%\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\*BuildNumber*. 有关将运行状况监视事件报告为 WMI 事件的详细信息, [请参阅笔尖:使用 WMI 提供 ASP.NET 运行状况监视事件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e57fea2f-610f-4432-9dd6-dd10a6c5bd10)。For more information about reporting health-monitoring events as WMI events, see [NIB: Using WMI to Deliver ASP.NET Health Monitoring Events](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e57fea2f-610f-4432-9dd6-dd10a6c5bd10). > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下, 你将能够使用已实现的 ASP.NET health 监视类型, 并且将通过在 "配置" ``部分中指定值来控制运行状况监视系统。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `` configuration section. 还可以从运行状况监视类型派生, 以创建自己的自定义事件和提供程序。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关创建自定义提供程序的示例, 请[参阅如何:实现运行状况监视自定义提供](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bbb1c959-e6e4-42b2-be62-49b7ca5ab72c)程序示例。For an example of creating a custom provider, see [How to: Implement the Health Monitoring Custom Provider Example](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bbb1c959-e6e4-42b2-be62-49b7ca5ab72c). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建由 ASP.NET health monitoring 颁发的 WMI 事件的使用者, 作为 Web 应用程序运行状况事件的结果。The following example shows how to create a consumer of WMI events issued by ASP.NET health monitoring as a result of Web-application health events. > [!NOTE] > 类和要监视的运行状况事件类型已默认配置。The class and the health event types to monitor are already configured by default. 唯一需要执行的操作是为所有运行状况事件定义规则。The only thing you need to do is to define the rule for all the health events. 请记住, 默认情况下不会将运行状况事件调度到提供程序。Remember that the health events are not dispatched to the provider by default. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WmiWebEventProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WmiWebEventProvider/CS/WmiWebEventListener.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WmiWebEventProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WmiWebEventProvider/VB/WmiWebEventListener.vb#1)] 下面的示例是一个配置文件节选, 其中显示``了一个配置节, 该配置节使 ASP.NET 可以使用提供程序来处理所有的运行状况监视事件。The following example is a configuration file excerpt that shows a `` configuration section that enables ASP.NET to use the provider to process all health-monitoring events. ``` ```

related.span: ASP.NET 运行状况监视概述
ASP.NET 运行状况-监视自定义提供程序示例
安装和配置 ASP.NET 提供程序

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数由 ASP.NET health 监视系统在内部使用。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 你永远不会使用它来创建类的实例, 但你可以在实现继承自此类的提供程序类型时调用此构造函数。You will never use it to create an instance of the class, but you can call this constructor when you implement your own provider type that inherits from this class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Flush() cil managed

summary.span: 从提供程序的缓冲区中移除所有事件。

span.span: Removes all events from the provider's buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法时, 将立即删除提供程序的缓冲区中的所有事件, 而不管自上次写入以来经过了多少时间或缓冲区中有多少个事件。When this method is called, all the events in the provider's buffer are immediately removed, regardless of how much time has elapsed since the last write or how many events are in the buffer. 上次写入的时间将重置为刷新操作的时间。The time of the last write is reset to the time of the flushing action. 如果未启用缓冲机制, 则调用此方法不起作用。Calling this method when the buffering mechanism is not enabled has no effect.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Initialize (string name, System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection config);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(string name, class System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection config) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (name As String, config As NameValueCollection)
public: override void Initialize(System::String ^ name, System::Collections::Specialized::NameValueCollection ^ config);

param.name: name
param.span: 配置文件中用于标识此提供程序的名称。

span.span: The name used in the configuration file to identify this provider.

param.name: config
param.span: 一个 对象，指定配置文件中为此提供程序分配的特性。

span.span: A object that specifies the attributes assigned for this provider in the configuration file.
Sets the initial values for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 在 调用构造函数后调用方法。ASP.NET calls the method after calling the constructor. 调用此方法来初始化具有配置文件中指定的配置设置和名称的类。This method is called to initialize the class with the configuration settings and name specified in the configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void ProcessEvent(class System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent eventRaised) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ProcessEvent (eventRaised As WebBaseEvent)

summary.span: 处理传递给提供程序的事件。

span.span: Processes the event passed to the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是 ASP.NET 运行状况监视调用来开始处理事件的方法。This is the method that ASP.NET health monitoring calls to start the processing of the event.

span.span: The event could not be raised.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Shutdown() cil managed

summary.span: 执行与关闭提供程序相关联的任务。

span.span: Performs tasks associated with shutting down the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 在承载 Web 应用程序的应用程序域终止时调用方法。ASP.NET calls the method when the application domain that hosts the Web application terminates. 调用方法来执行允许应用程序正常结束的任务。The method is called to perform tasks that will allow the application to end gracefully.
